title: i am so fucking sick of minions and the wall of flesh they create
body: If you don't have a mobility spell up or worse yet, are playing a champion without a dash or blink, your own minions are the strongest enemy you have to contend with sometimes.

ok people... lets ignore the issue for a moment and think about WHY i hasn't been addressed yet. from a game developer's standpoint

enemy creep block makes sense. end of story. no changes needed

allied creep block can certainly be an issue
but there are TWO ways to fix it

one is to make the champion clip over the minion, however this would allow larger champions like {{champion:31}}  {{champion:79}}  and {{champion:6}}  to block the enemy fro CSing with thier size

the other option is for the allied champion to override the minions movement and push it out of the way.
this while obviously the proper solution can TREMENDOUSLY harder to code if such a code, depending on how the initial coding of minion pathing was done.
while at the same time any bugs in this new pathing could render the entire game unplayable.

its a very "high risk" "low reward".

due to the fact this HASN'T been fixed yet, i think its safe to assume. this they have the current patching set up in a way that would make doing this very hard.
someone showed a fantastic video of a new pathing system with units weaving in and out by each other perfectly and saying why cant riot use that type of code.. and idk why not... but what im saying is if they ARN'T using that kind of code.. this would be a disaster to try to do.
Even more sick of them randomly switching agro and making me miss half my cs
